scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t csc648-frontend . && docker tag csc648-frontend chrisquinn/csc648-frontend && docker push chrisquinn/csc648-frontend
scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t csc648-gate . && docker tag csc648-gate chrisquinn/csc648-gate && docker push chrisquinn/csc648-gate
scripts.build-todo: docker build -f devops/todo.Dockerfile -t csc648-todo . && docker tag csc648-todo chrisquinn/csc648-todo && docker push chrisquinn/csc648-todo
scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml csc648
